Class CDrawing

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Drawing
        |
        +--CDrawing
public class CDrawing
extends Drawing

Manages line drawings built from characters. Supports various shapes, including lines, rectangles, and circles.

Version:
1.2 -- March 17, 1999
Author:
C. Vickery

Field Summary
protected  char backgroundChar
          Background character, space by default.
protected  char drawingChar
          The character currently used for drawing.
protected  char foregroundChar
          Foreground character, dot by default.
protected  char highlightChar
          Highlighting character, asterisk by default.
protected  char[][] theDrawing
          Array to hold the chars in the drawing
 
Fields inherited from class Drawing
height, itemList, NL, selected, visible, width
 
Constructor Summary
CDrawing(int width, int height)
          Creates a new Drawing of the given height and width, with default values for the background, drawing, and highlight characters.
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String toString()
          Returns a String that you can print to see the current Drawing.

Method Detail

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Returns a String that you can print to see the current Drawing. Returns an empty string if the drawing is hidden.
Parameters:
None -  
Returns:
String showing what the drawing looks like.
